OUTFITS: pumpkin-orange knitted witch dress with keyhole neckline and balloon sleeves
orange brocade mini-dress with lace cuffs and embroidered leaves
orange tweed sweater-dress with distressed hem and corset belt
orange silk tea-dress with deep neckline and fitted bodice
LIGHTING: golden hour window light with dust motes
soft overcast skylight through stained glass
library tungsten lamps with gentle falloff
BACKGROUNDS: antique library shelves stacked with weathered books
stained-glass mullioned windows with fall motifs
carved wooden desk cluttered with tomes and quills
cozy study nook with pumpkins and dried flowers
OBJECTS: oversized corset belt with ornate buckle
inkwell, quill, wax seal, parchment scrolls
POSES: three-quarter standing by window, hands on desk
hands clasping a closed grimoire at waist
one elbow resting on books, thoughtful gaze
CAMERA_ANGLES: three-quarter full body, low angle hero
close-up on face and hat brim, shallow depth
ACCESSORIES: wide-brim witch hat with ribbon and florals
ornate leather corset belt with embossed metal

HORROR_INTENSITY.1: hint of arcane glow on pages
HORROR_INTENSITY.2: faint sigils in glass and soft candle smoke
HORROR_INTENSITY.3: whispering runes and shadowy silhouettes (still elegant, not gruesome)
